ygData.subject: Re: A start as a fletcher
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a a guide that I am working on posted to my site. Check it out at: http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/index.htm E-Mail me with any comments. I have the
ygData.messageBody:
I have a a guide that I am working on posted to my site. Check it out at:

http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/index.htm

E-Mail me with any comments. I have the trivial caps upto skill 80.


At 10:37 PM 4/23/99 -0000, you wrote:
>From: thormael@...
>
>Hi fellow fletchers of Norrath,
>
>I'm just starting out fletching and havin spent some practice points in
the skill while leveling I started out at 13, as my first increase brang me
to 14. I tried the class A arrow, the ones with all the 1cp parts and
raised my skill to 16 where they are now trivial for me to make.
>
>I'm wondering if any of you keeps track of the differents "trivial" caps
related to arrows and bows they make, for me to try them in increasing order.
>
>Although I'm wondering if any combination is a valid one or if only some
will work. I guess it's the later so first, what is needed for class B
arrows? (or the arrows or bow you're currently making).
>
>Thanks,
>
>Thormael
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Start a new hobby. Meet a new friend.
>http://www.ONElist.com
>ONElist: The leading provider of free e-mail list services!
>
>
Xezol, lvl 12 Mag on E'Ci


Check out my EverQuest Info Site:
